Russian warship arrives in Qatar for defence exhibition, Interfax reportsRussia's Pacific Fleet frigate Marshal Shaposhnikov entered the Qatari port of Hamad where it will take part in the DIMDEX-2024 defence exhibition, Interfax news agency reported on Monday, citing the press service of fleet. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 02:56:31 GMT 633DKR44TBOUBKRR5KQUNNHE7A https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-warship-arrives-qatar-defence-exhibition-interfax-reports-2024-03-04/Reuters世界
South Korea says to start legal action against doctors over walkoutSouth Korea's health minister said on Monday authorities will start inspecting hospitals in order to take legal action against trainee doctors who have ignored an ultimatum to end a walkout over government plans to increase medical school admissions. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 02:43:36 GMT TOSLUMFNCVPTXDPFPPIQC3G3SFI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-says-start-legal-action-against-doctors-over-walkout-2024-03-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea moves to suspend licenses of 7,000 doctors, health official saysSouth Korea's government will take steps to suspend the medical licenses of some 7,000 trainee doctors who have walked off the job and ignored a back-to-work order, a vice health minister said on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 02:37:46 GMT VVOTPS3FWJNGRPI4HBN5UR6YMU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-moves-suspend-licenses-7000-doctors-health-official-says-2024-03-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Philippines conducts marine patrols to check presence of Chinese research shipsThe Philippines on Monday deployed a coastguard vessel to carry out a two-week patrol mission in waters north and east of the country to intensify its maritime presence and check on Chinese research vessels that were spotted in Benham Rise. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 02:05:22 GMT YFYI6YZOFZJ73DYGRK6POJERAM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-conducts-marine-patrols-check-presence-chinese-research-ships-2024-03-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea, US troops kick off annual drills over North threatsSouth Korean and U.S. militaries kicked off their spring drills on Monday with twice the number of troops joining compared to last year, officials said, as the allies seek to better counter North Korea's increasing nuclear and missile threats. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 02:01:35 GMT TK6QCOO4IFOJFBXU75AJJTU3DE https://www.reuters.com/world/south-korea-us-troops-kick-off-annual-drills-over-north-threats-2024-03-04/Hyonhee Shin世界
Australia welcomes Southeast Asia leaders with fresh maritime security fundingAustralia said on Monday Indo-Pacific and Southeast Asian countries are facing serious defence threats as it set aside more funds for a maritime security pact with ASEAN countries during a summit with the Southeast Asian bloc. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 23:48:40 GMT 4PGSZKZVY5NVJKEFVKRQ7UCF2E https://www.reuters.com/world/australia-welcomes-southeast-asia-leaders-with-fresh-maritime-security-funding-2024-03-03/Reuters世界
Kamala Harris' blunt Gaza words reflect intense government frustration over warKamala Harris pressed Israel to increase the flow of aid to ease what she called "inhumane" conditions and a "humanitarian catastrophe" among the Palestinian people. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 21:15:10 GMT IH5VXTUGPNP2BB3G3KYVCAYOYE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-vp-harris-urges-israeli-government-do-more-boost-aid-into-gaza-2024-03-03/Jeff Mason世界
Galapagos volcano starts to erupt on uninhabited islandEcuador's La Cumbre volcano, part of the Galapagos archipelago, has started to erupt, the government of the South American country reported on Sunday. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 20:26:32 GMT YPC2UIOZ5FPXZD6P6DMWKK4USQ https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/galapagos-volcano-starts-erupt-uninhabited-island-2024-03-03/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Ukraine's Zelenskiy: Political will in West required to secure needed suppliesPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy on Sunday called for Ukraine's Western partners to summon the political will to provide Kyiv with necessary military supplies or the world will face "one of the most shameful pages of history." Sun, 03 Mar 2024 20:13:24 GMT UH5ZMCMP5BN7XDBJSFQPJJUXCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-political-will-required-secure-needed-supplies-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
France's far-right RN makes immigration pillar of Europe poll campaignThe French far-right Rassemblement National (RN) of Marine Le Pen kicked off the party's campaign for the European elections in June on Sunday saying the vote will be a referendum on immigration. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 17:52:00 GMT NHZQUE53GVLF7PVYNDYKMOBQBI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/frances-far-right-rn-makes-immigration-pillar-europe-poll-campaign-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Iran's president discusses Gaza with Algerian counterpart, Algeria's presidency saysIran's President Ebrahim Raisi on Sunday discussed bilateral relations, energy cooperation, trade and Gaza with Algeria's leader Abdelmadjid Tebboune in a one-day state visit, according to Algeria's presidency. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 15:06:48 GMT 5GXYVZY5QBJ7PLFG34XGAQ3WYY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/irans-president-discusses-gaza-with-algerian-counterpart-algerias-presidency-2024-03-03/Reuters世界中东
